headline: McCormick & Company to Present at Consumer Analyst Group of New York Conference
summary: McCormick & Company, Incorporated (NYSE: MKC), a global leader in flavor, will be presenting at the Consumer Analyst Group of New York (CAGNY) Conference at 4:00 p.m. ET, on February 18, 2025. Representing McCormick will be Brendan Foley, Chairman, President & CEO; and Marcos Gabriel, Executive Vice President & CFO. The presentation will be webcast live via the McCormick website ir.mccormick.com. A replay will be available following the event through the same website.
